playn.core

Interface ImmediateLayer.Clipped

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImmediateLayer, Layer, Layer.HasSize
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImmediateLayerCanvas.Clipped, ImmediateLayerGL.Clipped
    Enclosing interface:
    ImmediateLayer

    public static interface ImmediateLayer.Clipped
extends ImmediateLayer, Layer.HasSize
    An immediate layer that is clipped to a specified bounds.
